resources.string: Please give this number a call. This is an automated message, and the sender\'s life could be in serious condition.

I am going live alone for the rest of my life (at least, that's the plan for now),
 where I am a person who enjoys solitude; however,
 I want folks to know that there is something wrong going on in my life if there is one.
 
 That's why I started writing this app.
 
 It wants the user to input two phone numbers, and the amount of days before it panics.
 When the user presses the check-in button,
 it refreshes to the amount the user initially inputted for the panic.
 
 Hope you also find use in this app.
